statements: SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE pressure > 1000 ORDER BY pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT timestamp, pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location = 'Paris' AND pressure < 990 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(pressure), MIN(pressure), AVG(pressure) FROM atmospheric_pressure;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(pressure) > 1000 ORDER BY avg_pressure DESC;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE pressure BETWEEN 950 AND 1050 ORDER BY pressure ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM atmospheric_pressure GROUP BY location ORDER BY num_readings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, pressure, location FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location LIKE 'Lo%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure_data;
SELECT pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM pressure_patterns_detected WHERE pattern='High';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern FROM pressure_patterns_detected WHERE start_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(pressure) AS max_pressure, MIN(pressure) AS min_pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure_data;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT AVG(pressure) AS average_pressure FROM atmospheric_pressure_data;
SELECT * FROM pressure_patterns_detected WHERE pattern LIKE '%high%';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern, start_timestamp FROM pressure_patterns_detected ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT time, pressure FROM atmospheric_data WHERE pressure > 1000;
SELECT pattern_name, detection_method FROM pressure_patterns WHERE detection_method = 'Sensor';
SELECT * FROM pattern_data WHERE pattern_id = 3 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_id, time, severity_level FROM pattern_data ORDER BY severity_level ASC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_data WHERE pressure > 100 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name FROM pressure_patterns WHERE detection_method = 'Algorithm' LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_id, pattern_id, severity_level FROM pattern_data WHERE severity_level BETWEEN 4 AND 7 ORDER BY pattern_id ASC, time DESC;
SELECT MAX(pressure) AS max_pressure, MIN(pressure) AS min_pressure FROM atmospheric_data;
SELECT AVG(severity_level) AS avg_severity, COUNT(*) AS total_patterns FROM pattern_data GROUP BY pattern_id HAVING total_patterns > 5;
SELECT * FROM PressureData
SELECT timestamp, pressure FROM PressureData WHERE pressure > 100
SELECT location_name FROM Location ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensor WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT MAX(timestamp), MIN(pressure) FROM PressureData
SELECT timestamp, pressure FROM PressureData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location.location_name FROM Sensor JOIN Location ON Sensor.location_id = Location.location_id
SELECT timestamp, pressure FROM PressureData WHERE pressure > 100
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM PressureData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT location_id, AVG(pressure_delta) AS avg_change FROM PressureChange GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY avg_change DESC
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure_changes
SELECT pressure, timestamp FROM atmospheric_pressure_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM pressure_patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'High Pressure'
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM pressure_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT pattern_name, timestamp FROM detected_patterns
SELECT * FROM atmospheric_pressure_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM pressure_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE 'ab%' ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;

SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM pressure_locations JOIN pressure_readings ON pressure_locations.location_id = pressure_readings.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_readings > 10;
SELECT * FROM detected_patterns WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM pressure_locations WHERE location_name = 'City A') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT DISTINCT pattern_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrence FROM detected_patterns GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING occurrence > 5 ORDER BY occurrence DESC;
